```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(parameters)
print2 <- function(x, y, r2 = TRUE) {
    cat("## ", x, "\n")
    suppressWarnings(print(print_md(parameters(y, ci = 0.89))))
    if (r2) {
        cat("$R^2$ = ", brms::bayes_R2(y)[1] , "\n\n")
    }
}
```

```{r, results = "asis", echo = FALSE}
print2("", readRDS("brms_mod.RDS"))
```
